Brad King (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brad_King_(actor) 0 Brad King (23 November 1917 - 1 November 1991) was an American actor. He is best known for briefly playing Hopalong Cassidy's sidekick in five of the Hoppy films. Brad_King ( 23_November_1917 - 1 November_1991 ) was an_American_actor . He is_best_known for briefly_playing_Hopalong_Cassidy 's_sidekick in five of the_Hoppy_films .
